編.definition: to weave; to plait; to organize; to group; to arrange; to edit; to compile; to write; to compose; to fabricate; to make up

編入.definition: to include (in a list etc); to assign (to a class, a work unit etc)

編列.definition: to arrange in order; to compile; to prepare (a budget, project etc)

編制.definition: to establish (a unit or department); staffing structure (excluding temporary and casual staff)

編劇.definition: to write a play; scenario; dramatist; screenwriter

編印.definition: to compile and print; to publish

編導.definition: to write and direct (a play, film etc); playwright-director; choreographer-director; scenarist-director

編年體.definition: in the style of annals; chronological history, the regular form of the Chinese dynastic histories

編成.definition: to organize; to put together; to edit

編次.definition: to arrange things in sequence; sequence in which things are arranged

編班.definition: to group students into classes; to divide people (staff members etc) into groups

編目.definition: to make a catalogue; catalogue; list

編磬.definition: musical instrument consisting of a set of chime stones suspended from a beam and struck as a xylophone

編織.definition: to weave; to knit; to plait; to braid; (fig.) to create (sth abstract, e.g. a dream, a lie etc)

編者案.definition: variant of 編者按|编者按[bian1 zhe3 an4]

編製.definition: to weave; to plait; to compile; to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)

編譯.definition: to translate and edit; translator-editor; (computing) to compile (source code)

編輯.definition: to edit; to compile; editor; compiler

編造.definition: to compile; to draw up; to fabricate; to invent; to concoct; to make up; to cook up

編遣.definition: to reorganize (troops etc) and discharge surplus personnel

編選.definition: to select and edit; to compile

編錄.definition: to select and edict; to edit extracts

編鐘.definition: set of bells (old Chinese music instrument)

編隊.definition: to form into columns; to organize into teams; formation (of ships or aircraft)
